Text: BaseContractpdffuncdocFetchnodeidElizabeth Just as an FYI I have spoken with Marty Jo at EntergyKoch I tried to explain to her that we are not disagreeing to sign EntergyKochs confirm when they are seller how we would just like for their confirmation to reflect the example confirmation within the EEI agreement I also mentioned to her that I had sent their confirmation for review to our attorney David Portz and I expressed the changes that needed to be made to their confirmation to their back office I have attached the EEI agreement just in case She mentioned at the very being of our conversation that she would like to discuss the issue with you Please call with any questions x Regards Kimberly enalivelinkexeBaseContractpdffuncdocFetchnodeid

BPA ConfirmationsDiana BPA is including Excess Federal Power and or Surplus Firm Power on their confirmations when BPA sells however BPA is not including the special language that was faxed to us by Holli Here are the following deal numbers EPMI BPA Excess Federal PowerSurplus Firm Power Excess Federal Excess Federal Excess Federal Surplus Firm Power Excess Federal Surplus Firm Power Excess Federal I have not sent these confirms signed back to BPA yet Are these confirms ok for signature without the language or do you want me to hold off until the issue is worked out with BPA Regards Kimberly

RE More about short codes Cc PST Cara Email Corry Bentley with the list of counterparties you would changed If he is ok with those changes then you may forward those changes to me and I will put in a GCP Request to have each one changed in the system Just let me know Regards Kimberly Original Message From Semperger Cara Sent Friday July PM To Indelicato Kimberly Subject More about short codes Hi Kim Thanks for getting SCEM changed to MIRANT They started showing up right this morning How difficult is it to get them changed and who all is affected by it I have a laundry list of codes that are cumbersome or confusing and would like to see about changing a batch of them I will do all the leg work of finding out if certain ones are ok with everyone but wanted your input and advice Thanks Cara

FW Name ChangesPST Cara Please review Corrys list of short codes that he would like revised see below If you have any issues or would like additional counterparty names to the list please let me know Regards Kimberly Original Message From Bentley Corry Sent Tuesday August PM To Indelicato Kimberly Subject RE Name Changes Kim Yes please She may have additional name changes or alternatives to these for us to discuss Thanks Corry Original Message From Indelicato Kimberly Sent Tuesday August PM To Bentley Corry Subject RE Name Changes Sure Do you want me to run these by Cara Semperger first before these are changed Regards Kimberly Original Message From Bentley Corry Sent Tuesday August PM To Indelicato Kimberly Subject Name Changes Kim Could we possibly get the following names changed in the system Let me know if you need further information Thanks Corry Name ID Current New The New Power Company NEWPOWCOM NEWPOWER FPL Energy Power Marketing Inc FPLENEPOW FPL NRG Power Marketing Inc NRGPOWMAR NRG AES NewEnergy Inc NEWENERGY NEVI Northern States Power Company NORTHERST NSP Rainbow Energy Marketing Corporation RAINBOWENE RAINBOW Tenaska power Services Co TENASKAPOW TNSK

Changed an EOL tradensf Kate was an EOL trade that Chris Mallory did When it was done on line the delivery point was NP now in Enpower it has been changed to SP Could you check with Chris if this is correct I thought that we were not allowed to change EOL trades If he did then I will have to get with Legal to find out what our next step would be Thanks Kimberly

nsf Kate This is a Tom Alonso trade For these two trades they are entered as Florida Power Light FPL Energy Power Marketing sent a confirmation over on this trade Could you ask Tom if he entered the trade incorrectly for both deal numbers Secondly on the confirmation shows a price of We have in the system Which one is correct Thanks Kimberly
nsf Kate Spoke with Prebon and they dont show this trade Could it be with another Broker KI
nsf Tacoma called and said this is a deal for May We have light load in system Could you ask Diana which is correct Thanks Kimberly

New Counterparty Name on nsf Kate this deal has a new counteparty but it is not in the system yet Can we get more details on this like what the actual name of MDEA is address contact phone numbers etc Thanks Kimberly

Re New Counterparty Name on nsf Never mind I just realized this is an east trade Sorry KI Kate Symes AM To Kimberly CT cc Subject Re New Counterparty Name on I cant seem to pull up is that the correct deal number Kate From Kimberly Indelicato AM To Kate CT cc Subject New Counterparty Name on Kate this deal has a new counteparty but it is not in the system yet Can we get more details on this like what the actual name of MDEA is address contact phone numbers etc Thanks Kimberly

RE Smurfit Stone MEPSA termination Cc PST David Double checked and all Smurfit Stone trades are under the Master Energy Purchase Sale Agreement Thanks Kimberly Original Message From Portz David Sent Thursday January PM To Indelicato Kimberly Cc Denton Rhonda L Panus Stephanie Bailey Susan White Stacey W Subject Smurfit Stone MEPSA termination Please confirm to me to the above email recipients that all wholesale power trades with Smurfit Stone are under the Master Energy Purchase Sale Agreement so that she may record as Y Legals conclusion that transactions with Smurfit are terminated effective per their termination letter to EPMI Thanks David

RE NonTerminated CounterpartiesPST I will check into it right now Kimberly Original Message From White Stacey W Sent Thursday January PM To Indelicato Kimberly Subject RE NonTerminated Counterparties Do you know if the rest of these autoterminations apply to all deals we have with this counterparties or just certain deals Please look into them and let me know as soon as possible Stacey Original Message From Indelicato Kimberly Sent Thursday January PM To White Stacey W Cc Panus Stephanie Sager Elizabeth Hall Steve C Legal Yoder Christian Portz David Denton Rhonda L Subject RE NonTerminated Counterparties Stacey The Enabling Agreement applies to deal s As for the Enabling agreement here are the following ref s If you need any other please let me know Thanks Kimberly Original Message From Portz David Sent Thursday January PM To Indelicato Kimberly Denton Rhonda L Cc Panus Stephanie White Stacey W Sager Elizabeth Hall Steve C Legal Yoder Christian Subject RE NonTerminated Counterparties KimberlyRhonda As mentioned on a voicemail to Rhonda the Modesto enabling agreement does not have auto termination while the Enabling agreement does Can you give Stacey White guidance as to the transactions under each Thanks Original Message From Portz David Sent Thursday January AM To Indelicato Kimberly Cc Panus Stephanie White Stacey W Sager Elizabeth Nettelton Marcus Hall Steve C Legal Yoder Christian Mann Kay Clark Barton Subject RE NonTerminated Counterparties Thank you and great job quick and thorough turnaround Autotermination porivisons are present in the referenced masters with these parties some of which had been identified before COLORADOSPRUTI Physical Power Purchase Sale Agreement ENRONENESERINC Physical Power Master Bilateral GLENDALECIT Physical Bilateral Enabling Agreement GMP Physical Unilateral Enabling Agreement Sales MICHIGANSOUCEN Physical Energy Purchase Sale Agree Dated Bilateral Enabling Agreement dated both have AT MISSOURIJOIMUN Physical Long Form Energy Purchase Sale Agreement MODESTOIRR Physical Agreement for Foirm Power Purchase Master Energy Purchase Sale Agreement PORTLANDGENELE Physical Service Agreement Electric Tariff Vl Service Agreement Electric Tariff Vl Service Agreement Electric Tariff Vl VERMONTPUBLIC Physical Bilateral Enabling Agreement Power Purchase Agreement both have AT WELDED TUBE CO Physical Option Agr I have cleared with Eliz Sager that Stephanie these will be put into the spreadsheet log and the transactions put into the terminated book by Stacey David Original Message From Indelicato Kimberly Sent Wednesday January PM To Portz David Subject NonTerminated Counterparties David Attached is the spreadsheet containing the contract names and dates for the nonterminated counterparties Should you have any question or need me to research any information further please let me know Regards Kimberly File Nonterminated as of Finalxls
